summary: Pre-deployment stability check completed successfully. All critical paths tested - 27/27 backend API tests passed, all frontend pages load without JavaScript console errors. Project Schedule module, PDF generation, and all main modules are working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: All API endpoints return correct status codes and data structures
Project Schedule PDF generation works correctly (valid PDF, >10KB)
PDF Template Settings includes Project Schedule report type
No JavaScript console errors on any tested page
All navigation and page loads work correctly
context_for_next_testing_agent: Pre-deployment stability check passed. All modules tested: Login, Dashboard, Projects, AMC, Calibration, Equipment Test Reports (Relay, Battery), Project Schedule (create/edit/PDF), PDF Template Settings, Travel Log, Attendance, Leave Management, User Management. No issues found.

Equipment_Test_Reports.equipment_page_ui: PASS - shows all equipment types (Transformer, Earth Pit, Energy Meter, Voltmeter, Ammeter, MCCB, ACB, VCB, DG, Lighting, Lightning Arrestor, UPS, Electrical Panel, Relay, APFC, Battery)

Project_Schedule.create_modal: PASS - Create Schedule modal opens with Customer Information and Phases sections

PDF_Template_Settings.project_schedule_type: PASS - Project Schedule report type included

Travel_Log.page_ui: PASS - shows 6 trips with approval workflow

Attendance.page_ui: PASS - shows attendance calendar with check-in/check-out

Leave_Management.page_ui: PASS - shows leave balance (Casual: 12, Sick: 4, Earned: 15, Comp Off: 2)

pages_tested_ui: Dashboard - loads with stats, charts, announcements
AMC Management - shows 2 contracts with dashboard
Project Reports - shows Equipment Test Reports, Audit Reports, Work Completion Certificates, Project Schedule
Project Schedule - create modal with Customer Info and Phases
Equipment Test Reports - shows all 16 equipment types
Travel Log Management - shows trips with approval workflow
My Attendance - shows calendar with check-in button
Leave Management - shows leave balance and requests
PDF Template Settings - shows Global Settings and Cover Page Designs tabs
console_errors: None - no JavaScript console errors on any page

mocked_apis.Billing: Uses static non-functional data (as noted in requirements)
